Title: Establishes a problem gambling research institute to examine and find solutions to problem gambling in the state of New York
Summary: Establishes a problem gambling research institute to examine and find solutions to problem gambling in the state of New York; creates a fund to fund such problem gambling institute.
LawCode: Add ยง355-f, Ed L; add ยง97-bbbbb, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the state finance law, in relation to creating a problem gambling research institute and fund
